channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: National Guard member dies, another critical after Washington shooting: Who are the soldiers?
History Today: When the Tehran Conference unfolded with the meeting of the 'Big Three'
FirstUp: Modi to visit Udupi and Goa, ICC ruling on Duterte... News to watch out for
Hong Kong high-rise fire: Can China keep control over the city or will resentment boil over?
Not invited to G20: What is Donald Trump's problem with South Africa?
What’s flying off the shelves as Black Friday sales kick in?
A tenuous truce: Can the updated US-Ukraine peace plan actually end the war?
item.description: Russia is highly unlikely to accept the ‘modified peace plan’ because the updated version incorporates key Ukrainian and European demands that directly contradict Moscow’s core objectives

item.title: Beijing’s latest provocation: Time to call the Chinese bluff on Arunachal Pradesh
item.description: The Chinese harassment of an Indian citizen from Arunachal Pradesh will impact the scope of possible rapprochement between the two Asian powers

item.title: Donald Trump eyes loophole in Epstein Files Transparency Act
item.description: The US President had already instructed Pam Bondi to investigate Jeffrey Epstein’s ties to Bill Clinton and others, which allows withholding or redacting information

item.title: How Japan’s latest tensions with China will fuel stronger Delhi-Tokyo strategic alignment
item.description: The recent flare-up started after the statement by Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi in parliament that a Chinese military action against Taiwan could be considered a ‘survival-threatening situation’ for Japan

item.title: Strategic bonanza: Israel and India unlock next phase of partnership
item.description: Israel’s innovation ecosystem and India’s scale and manufacturing capabilities create a natural synergy

item.title: Timothée Chalamet’s bizarre Marty Supreme press run taps into a deeper cultural mood
item.description: Timothée Chalamet and A24’s wild Marty Supreme campaign, from an orange blimp over Los Angeles to ping-pong heads in New York, turns film marketing into a joyful, viral cultural event.
